(a) total use of land;
(b) total sealed area;
(c) total nature-oriented area on site; and (d) total nature-oriented area off site.
AR 35. The undertaking may disclose, for example, land cover change, which is the physical
representation of the drivers “habitat modification” and “industrial and domestic activities”,
i.e., the man-made or natural change of the physical properties of the earth’s surface at a
specific location.
